briefTitle: UARK 2009-09 Myeloma Cure Project: Prospective Trial of Indefinite Revlimid Maintenance Versus Observation for Currently Event-Free Patients With Multiple Myeloma
officialTitle: Myeloma Cure Project: Prospective, Randomized Trial of Indefinite Revlimid Maintenance Versus Observation for Currently Event-Free Patients With Multiple Myeloma Who Have Completed 3 Years of VTD/TD or VTD or VRD Maintenance on Total Therapy 3 (TT3) Trials 2003-33 and 2006-66
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine in a phase II trial, whether further maintenance therapy with Revlimid can extend the duration of progression-free survival and the duration of complete or near complete response compared to no further therapy beyond the TT3 protocol-prescribed 3 years of maintenance with 1 year of VTD plus 2 years with TD, 3 years with VTD (2003-33) or VRD (2006-66).
